input.sentences: the families gathered for the funeral services
there were even camera 's capturing the event
many paid tribute to the person
and grieved over the loss of a loved one
they gave one final salute to the person
output.sentences: There was a military funeral in the city downtown earlier today.
There was a massive turnout for the fallen solider: members of the community, NAACP, ACLU and alumni of HBCUs.
I heard the flowers will be donated to charity by the soldier's family.
The family of the fallen solider decided not to get a headstone; they chose a plot marker.
The Navy gave a wonderful send off: I heard they preformed a 21 gun salute.
